title: NBA Trade Deadline, Part 3: Last-Minute Deals With Ryen Russillo and Kevin Oâ€™Connor
description:
In Part 3 of the NBA trade deadline coverage on the 'BS Pod,' The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo and Kevin O'Connor to discuss the final minutes leading up to deadline, including JJ Redick heading to the Mavericks, Victor Oladipo to the Heat, the Celtics trading Daniel Theis to the Bulls for Mo Wagner, buyout candidates, and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
